comments.body:
this fails in the CI with the following error https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/82462/pull-kubernetes-verify/1172046655751458817
```
diff -Naupr -x _output /home/prow/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/proxy/metaproxier/BUILD /tmp/verify-bazel.BHCEhE/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/proxy/metaproxier/BUILD
--- /home/prow/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/proxy/metaproxier/BUILD	2019-09-12 07:19:19.126426422 +0000
+++ /tmp/verify-bazel.BHCEhE/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/proxy/metaproxier/BUILD	2019-09-12 07:19:36.210959150 +0000
@@ -1,10 +1,6 @@
 package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
 
-load(
-    "@io_bazel_rules_go//go:def.bzl",
-    "go_library",
-    "go_test",
-)
+load("@io_bazel_rules_go//go:def.bzl", "go_library")
 
 go_library(
     name = "go_default_library",
@@ -19,13 +15,6 @@ go_library(
     ],
 )
 
-go_test(
-    name = "go_default_test",
-    srcs = [],
-    embed = [":go_default_library"],
-    deps = [],
-)
-
 filegroup(
     name = "package-srcs",
     srcs = glob(["**"]),

Run ./hack/update-bazel.sh
```
Thanks, still learning about the tools in `./hack`
